getGlobalProblem

Problem getGlobalProblem()
Returns:
the global problem - each agent have its own "version" of problem that is based on the global problem using the global problem is reserved to the execution environment or to the execution tools - do not use it inside your algorithms - use Agents getProblem() instaed.

Mailer getMailer()
Returns:
the mailer attached to this execution.

Returns:
the system clock, if this execution is an asynchronus execution then it will return null.
